name: smite
description: Zero-debt engineering with unified agents (refactor, explore, implement) and multi-agent orchestration (agents). Features token optimization (75% savings), parallel execution (2-3x speedup), and auto-learning.

metadata.description: SMITE v3.6.0 - Unified agent architecture with core agents (refactor, explore, implement) and specialized agents (architect, builder, note). Reorganized mobs→agents with cleaner structure.

plugins.name: core
plugins.description: Shared utilities, templates, and validation schemas for all SMITE plugins. Includes parallel execution, plan-mode-first, and auto-learning infrastructure.

plugins.name: refactor
plugins.description: Unified code refactoring with systematic validation. Modes: quick, full, analyze, review, resolve, verify. Auto-parallel for complex refactors.

plugins.name: explore
plugins.description: Unified code exploration with native grepai integration (75% token savings). Modes: deep, quick, pattern, impact, semantic. Multi-source research capabilities.

plugins.name: implement
plugins.description: Unified implementation agent consolidating all workflows: quick, epct, builder, predator, ralph. Auto-parallel, adversarial mode, and technical subagents.

plugins.name: agents
plugins.description: Multi-agent orchestration system with spec-first workflow - Architect, Builder, Refactor agents. Tech-specific subagents for Next.js, Rust, Python, Go.

plugins.name: basics
plugins.description: Essential commands: commit, cleanup, explore, learn, data, teach, smite, note. Includes AI-powered Obsidian note management with templates.

plugins.name: shell
plugins.description: Shell shortcuts (cc, ccc) for quick Claude Code access from terminal. Cross-platform support for bash, zsh.

plugins.name: auto-rename
plugins.description: Intelligent session renaming based on context. Automatically suggests meaningful session names from task content.
